attributes.action: concentrate on addressing the real causes of co2 emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the climate changes naturally anyway, the current focus seems to be on CO2 emissions. Unfortunately all the "anti-CO2" efforts are directed at less than 20% of the "causes" ie cars, trucks and aeroplanes. Why is nothing being done about the other minimum eighty per cent?
